p.s: The play Macbeth which is written by Shakespeare, is published on the 16th century deals with information about a menman, named Macbeth, who defends his tribe form two other tribes forcing their way into Macbeth's kingdom.
The kingKing was very pleased from this action and invites Macbeth to his castle.
Macbeth also receives a prophecy from three witches which reveal him that he will become king.
In the following scene, Lady Macbeth tries to convince her husband to kill Duncan, so that Macbeth earlier become king.
Macbeth and his wife are having lunch.
She asks why Macbeth left the chamber and says that the chamber showed her respect lately.
Lady Macbeth reminds her husband of the plan to kill Duncan.
At the same moment, she also wants to encourage him, because of the fact that he defends the tribe from invading groups, which shows that Macbeth is actually brave.
Over the course of the scene, Lady Macbeth alludes to the masculinity of her husband to change his opinion.
She also put her idea in a concretconcrete form, which she explains to Macbeth and displays that her plan is safe and nobody finds out who killed Duncan.
She also degrades Macbeth with the plan to strengthen him, so that he agrees to his wife's plan.
